attributes.action: Remove American Pit Bull Terriers from the dangerous dog act!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone has the wrong idea about pit bulls! they save lives, stay true to their owners and become your best friend! you see all these photos of dog fighting but that isnt the dogs choice! they would much rather sit at home lazing around on the sofa! they are forced into dog fighting, and if they dont their owners will most probably kill them. so save the pit bull and give them a life they deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
